entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
